definition: bell made of copper or bronze
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]

sentences.english: The dwarf sat down and the elf rang the little brass bell.
sentences.chinese: 侏儒坐下來，而小仙人搖了那小銅鈴。

sentences.english: There are bells hang in height in order to first touch for the championship ring.
sentences.chinese: 也有在高處掛上銅鈴的，以先碰響者爲冠軍。

sentences.english: Next to a brass bell as big as a hazelnut .
sentences.chinese: 就靠在一隻榛果般大的銅鈴旁邊。

definition: lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence
see 櫻桃小嘴|樱桃小嘴[ying1 tao2 xiao3 zui3]
to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
lit. dumb as a wooden chicken (idiom); fig. dumbstruck
no way out/nowhere to go/trapped beyond hope of rescue/painted into a corner
